original_text: Finally, the priests brought the male goats in front of King Hezekiah and the people who were there. The king and the people put their hands on the goats.
korean_text: 이에 속죄제물로 드릴 숫염소들을 왕과 회중 앞으로 끌어오매 그들이 그 위에 안수하고

sentences.original_text: Finally, the priests brought the male goats
and the people who were there
The king and the people put their hands on the goats
